original_title: The Middle Ages: Castles Under Siege
overview: Quickly, the castles obtain not only a military function, but also a symbolic function of practical life. As permanent representations of power, they are intense and articulate centers of life, real human microcosms populated by a various types of people. Within its walls live nobles, armed men, as well as servants, and artisans such as blacksmiths.
title: The Middle Ages: Castles Under Siege
